mapper.insert:
select SEQ_CTAS_FLT_PLANE_NO.nextval as recId from dual
insert into CTAS_FLT_PLANE_NO (REC_ID, CARRIER, SUB_COMPANY_ID, SUB_COMPANY_DSC, PLANE_NO, STAR_DATE, END_DATE, MONTH, REMARK, CREATOR_ID, CREATOR_NAME, CREATOR_TIME, PLANE_USE_MODE, COMPANY_CODE) values (#{recId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{carrier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subCompanyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subCompanyDsc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{planeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{starDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{month,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{planeUseMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update CTAS_FLT_PLANE_NO set CARRIER = #{carrier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUB_COMPANY_ID = #{subCompanyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUB_COMPANY_DSC = #{subCompanyDsc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PLANE_NO = #{planeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STAR_DATE = #{starDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, END_DATE = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MONTH = #{month,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PLANE_USE_MODE = #{planeUseMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where REC_ID = #{recId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: SELECT T.REC_ID, T.CARRIER, T.SUB_COMPANY_ID, T.SUB_COMPANY_DSC, T.PLANE_NO, T.STAR_DATE, T.END_DATE, T.MONTH, T.REMARK, T.CREATOR_ID, T.CREATOR_NAME, T.CREATOR_TIME, T.PLANE_USE_MODE, T.COMPANY_CODE from CTAS_FLT_PLANE_NO T WHERE T.REC_ID = #{recId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
